page.content:
{FOOD} North East of Scotland Recipe
{HAGGIS 1 Stomach bag of sheep (washed) 1 Pluck i.e. liver heart and lungs (boiled for two hours and finely minced - use only 1/3 of lungs) 500 ml. of stock 2 Onions (diced finely) 100g. beef suet (skinned and chopped) 300g. medium/coarse oatmeal (toasted) 5 ml. spoonful salt 5 ml. spoonful freshly ground black pepper. Mix ingredients, fill the bag little more than and sew tightly. Prick bag and boil slowly for 3 hrs. pricking occasionally to prevent bursting. Serves 10 - 12.
